Package DAO

Class CustomerDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • DAO.CustomerDAO
  • public class CustomerDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    This class deals with accessing customer information from the database. Queries the customers table in the database and retrieves the results.

      • getAllCustomers

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Customer> getAllCustomers()
                                                                   throws java.sql.SQLException
        Retrieves customers from the database. Queries the customers table in the database and retrieves all customers.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • createCustomer

        public static void createCustomer​(int custId,
                                  java.lang.String custName,
                                  java.lang.String address,
                                  java.lang.String pCode,
                                  java.lang.String phone,
                                  int divId)
                           throws java.sql.SQLException
        Creates a new customer in the database. Inserts the new customer into the customers table in the database using the arguments provided (which correspond to the tables fields).
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • updateCustomer

        public static void updateCustomer​(int index,
                                  Customer customer)
                           throws java.sql.SQLException
        Updates a customer in the database.
        Parameters:
        index - the customer id of the appointment being updated
        customer - the new customer after changes have been made
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • lookUpCustomer

        public static Customer lookUpCustomer​(int customerID)
                               throws java.sql.SQLException
        Looks up the customer by id. Used in conjunction with the updateCustomer method to update a customer.
        Parameters:
        customerID - the customer id of the appointment that is to be updated
        Returns:
        returns the customer that is going to be updated
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • deleteCustomer

        public static void deleteCustomer​(Customer customer)
                           throws java.sql.SQLException
        Deletes a customer from the database. Queries the customers table in the database and then deletes the customer from it.
        Parameters:
        customer - the customer to be deleted
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
